content: reach the end of your cast on stitches place a bor marker and join in the round from now on you will slip the bor marker before working on the next round work 2 more rounds of 1x1 rib in color b drop color b to the front of your work brim step 1 with color a work 2 rounds of 1x1 rib drop color a at the front of your work brim step 2 with color b work 3 rounds of 1x1 rib drop color b at the front of your work repeat brim steps 1 & 2 until your work measures 3 8 cm from the cast on edge be sure to finish after completing brim step 2 brimfoldline with color a work 1 round of 1x1 rib then in color a work 1 round of stockinette knit every stitch - this will give us a defined fold line with color a work 1 round of 1x1 rib drop color a brimcontinued brim continued step 1 with color b work 3 rounds of 1x1 rib drop color b at the back of your work brim continued step 2 with color a work 2 rounds of 1x1 rib drop color a at the back of your work repeat brim continued steps 1 & 2 until your work measures 2 5cm from the fold line note the brim con t section is designed to be shorter than the brim section if you re using different yarn for the crown of your hat break yarns a and b from the brim and leave a tail to weave in later if you re using the same yarns throughout your hat do not break the yarn continue to the crown section crowncolorwork if you re introducing new colors in this section choose which of your new yarns will be color a and b you ll join your new yarns in the setup round below note there is a chart on the last page of the pattern for those of you who are graphically inclined switch to your larger us 6 / 4mm 16 circular needle setup round k1 in color a k4 color b k4 color a k4 color b k4 color a k4 color b k4 color a k4 color b k1 color a pm repeat until bor colorwork pattern k1 in color a k4 color b k4 color a k4 color b k4 color a k4 color b k4 color a k4 color b k1 color a sm repeat until bor work in the established colorwork pattern until your crown colorwork measures 2 5 7cm or 3 5 9cm shorter than your desired finished length if you plan on working this section longer than 2 5 7 cm your yardage requirements may differ crownshaping switch to dpns or magic loop when necessary note there is a chart on the last page of the pattern for those of you who are graphically inclined decrease round 1 k1 color a k1 color b
